alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nueces, southwestern San Patricio and northeastern Jim Wells Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 946 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandia, or near Mathis, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Patricio, Sandia, Bluntzer and Alfred-South La Paloma. This includes Interstate 37 between mile markers 27 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells
